query: SELECT team, name, COUNT(*) as count, GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids FROM players WHERE team IN (SELECT team FROM players GROUP BY team HAVING COUNT(*) > 14) GROUP BY team, name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY team, name
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute SELECT team, name, COUNT(*) as count, GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids FROM players WHERE team IN (SELECT team FROM players GROUP BY team HAVING COUNT(*) > 14) GROUP BY team, name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY team, name
